data.title: Emap, ipc media & bauer
data.meta_description: Emap, ipc media & bauer - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
2. Established in 1947 Mainstream Magazine

3. About EMAP EMAP owns industry-leading brands that refer to the business world, such as, Retail, Health, Construction, Architecture, and Fashion. Their aim is to connect professionals and encourage them to grow and inspire them to achieve their goals. Brands such as HSJ and Retail Week create deep bonds to increase value for their customers. They supply this through senior networking events, for instance, through industry leading awards; online data products; social media communities; headline conferences and critical insight, news and analysis. They create solutions for advertisers and sponsors to connect with their audience and have built a very good reputation in doing so. Their reputation means a lot to them and they strive to keep their customers trusting them by doing the best they possibly can in their industry of expertise with their high quality journalists. “For our customers, EMAP provides the best possible way to connect with their world. We are their competitive advantage”. http://www.emap.com/about-us

4. Look Magazine Mainstream Q Magazine Mainstream FHM Magazine Niche Their Magazines

5. Established in 1963 International Magazine

6. Who are they? The International Publishing Corporation Ltd was formed in 1963 following the merger of the UK's three leading magazine publishers - George Newnes, Odhams Press and Fleetway Publications - who came together with the Mirror Group to form the International Publishing Corporation (IPC). It has more than 60 iconic brands! (http://www.ipcmedia.com/ ) The magazine has been around for 150 years. IPC Media is a Time Warner Company. IPC is and INTERNATIONAL magazine and distributes to over 80 countries world wide!

7. Their Magazines As the UK's leading consumer magazine publisher we engage with 26m UK adults - almost two thirds of UK women and 42% of UK men. Fashion & Beauty Young Men & Music Sports & LeisureCountry Pursuits & Equestrian

8. Established in 1875 Europe's biggest distributer Mainstream Magazine

9. H Bauer is the largest privately owned publisher in Europe. It publishes their magazines in Germany, France, Spain, Portugal and the United Kingdom. Bauer also publishes in the United States and Mexico. The Bauer Publishing Group was founded in Hamburg in 1875 by Johann Bauer. It was managed by four generations of the Bauer family. The Bauer Publishing Group began at a printing house and then grew into a worldwide publishing empire comprising 282 magazines in 15 countries with 6,600 employees worldwide and an annual turnover of 1.79 billion Euro. Bauer first published Bella magazine in the UK in 1987. they brought a new image to the UK, Bella made a significant impact on the women's market. The company made another outbreak again in 1990 with the launch of Take a Break magazine. This quickly became on of the UK’s leading magazine brands. Despite strong competition, Take a Break has managed to maintain its No.1 status, currently selling over 1 million copies a week. (http://www.bauermedia.co.uk/ ). Background Information

10. Their Magazines Closer Magazine Mainstream GRAZIA Magazine Mainstream Take a Break Magazine Magazine
